about.title: About Me
about.description: Software Engineer with experience building solutions that reach production and generate real impact on users and teams. Focused on debugging, system optimization, and delivering useful features that provide concrete value.

optimization.title: Database Optimization
optimization.description: Profiling and optimizing SQL queries to reduce response times in production

debugging.title: Production Debugging
debugging.description: Resolving bugs in multi-tech systems: PHP, JavaScript, Go, Angular, React

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: .NET applications, biometric authentication systems, and microservices

integration.title: Integrations & Automation
integration.description: APIs, AI-powered chatbots, and process automation for teams

educationData.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Natural and Exact Sciences

experienceData.title: Software Engineer I
responsibilities: Optimized SQL queries in the platform, reducing response times by removing unnecessary operations in queries.

Debugged and resolved production bugs across components written in PHP, JavaScript, Go, Angular, and React. Leveraged AI-assisted tools (Windsurf, Codex) to accelerate development and debugging cycles.

experienceData.title: External Developer
responsibilities: Continuation of internship work. Developed proof-of-concept solutions and production .NET applications with SQL Server to evaluate technical feasibility and support team architectural decisions.

experienceData.title: Software Engineer Intern – Continuous Improvement Area
responsibilities: Improved part of the authentication system using biometric libraries, enabling secure user verification in production.
Optimized slow SQL queries identified through profiling and refactored scheduled jobs, reducing execution times and database load.

experienceData.title: Software Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Integrated OpenAI-powered chatbot into platform and built microservice to archive conversations in AWS S3, automating responses to frequent queries and reducing Customer Care team tickets.
